page.title: 08West Park Farm.
page.content: West Park Farm is farmed by Mr Sharp. He farms 620 acres of land, working twelve hours a day and using a lot of farm equipment. He has cows,sheep, hens,peacocks,horses,ducks and geese, which he keeps for milk, meat and eggs,but also to try and make some money.He does not milk the cows himself.His fields are crops and both annual and perennial grass which is grown for grazing and silage.He grows wheat and barley for animal feed and maize for silage.Oil seed rape is grown for margarine,peas for protein feed for the animals,turnips and kale for the cows.He has 10 acres that he can't farm including{Parham Wood.}He has mink, foxes, badgers,weasels and stoats wild on the farm.They are a nuisance because they kill poultry.
